verses.padam: iṣE|tvA|UrjE|tvA|vAyavaḥ|stha|upAyava̍ ityupa̍ - Ayavaḥ|stha|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|prEti̍|arpayatu|śrEṣṭha̍tamAyEti̍ śrEṣṭha# - tamAya|karmaṇE|Eti̍|pyAyadhvam|aGniyAḥ|dEvaBAgamiti̍# dEva- BAgam|UrjasvatIḥ|paya̍svatIḥ|prajAva̍tIriti̍# prajA-vatIḥ|anamIvAḥ|ayakṣmAḥ|mA|vaḥ|stEnaḥ|Iśata|mA|aGaśaṃsa̍ ityaGa - śaṃqsaḥ|rudrasya|hEtiḥ|parIti̍|vaḥ|vRuṇaktu|dhruvAḥ|asminn|gOpa̍tAviti̍ gO -patau|syAta|bahvIḥ|yajamAnasya|paśUn|pAhi||1̍ (iṣE - tricatvAriṃśat̍ )
verses.samhita: iṣE tvOrjE tvA# vAyavaḥ̍ sthOpAyavaḥ̍ stha dEvO vaḥ̍ savitA prArpayatu̍ śrEṣṭhatamAya̍ karmaṇa̍ A pyAyaddhvamaGniyA̍ dEvaBAgamUrjasvatIḥ̍ payasvatIḥ̍ prajAvatIranamIvA̍ ayakṣmA̍ mA vaḥ̍ stEna Iśata̍ mA&GaśaṃsO̍ rudrasya# hEtiḥ pari# vO vRuṇaktu dhruvA asmin gOpatau̍ syAta bahvIr yajamAnasya̍ paśUn pAhi||1̍

verses.padam: yajñasya|GOṣat|asi|pratyu̍ṣṭamiti̍ prati# - uṣṭam|rakṣaḥ|pratyu̍ṣṭA̍ iti prati# - uṣṭAḥ|arAtayaḥ|prEti̍|iyam|agAt|dhiṣaṇA̱|baṛqhiḥ|acCa̍|manu̍nA|kRutA|svadhayEti̍# sva-dhayA̱|vitaṣṭEti vi - taṣṭA|tE|Eti|vahanti|kavaya̍ḥ|purastA̱t|dEvEBya̍ḥ|juṣṭa̱m|iha|baṛqḥiḥ|Asada̍ ityA̱ - sadE̱|dEvAnA̱m|pariṣUtamiti# pari -sUtam|asi|vaṛqṣavRuddhamiti̍# vaṛqṣa -vRuddham|asi|dEvabaṛhiriti̍ dEva# - baṛqhiḥ|mA|tvA|anvak|mA|tiryak|parva|tE|rAdhyAsam|AcCEttEtyA̱̍ - CEttA|tE|mA|riṣam|dEvabaṛhiriti̍ dEva# -baṛqhiḥ|śatavaḷśamiti̍# śata - vaḷśam|vIti|rOha|sahasra̍valśA̍ iti# sahasra# -valśAḥ|2 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñasya# GOṣadasi̍ pratyuṣṭaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭA̍ arAtayaḥ̍ prEyamagAddhiṣaṇA̍# barqḥiracCa manunA̍ kRutA svadhayA vitaṣṭA̍ ta A vahanti̍ kavayaḥ̍ purastA̱d- dEvEByO juṣṭamiha̍ barqḥirAsadE# dEvAnA̱M pariṣUtamasi̍ varq.ṣavRuddhamasi̍ dEvabaṛhirmA̍ tvA&qnva~g mA tiryak parva# tE rAddhyAsamAcCEttA tE mA riṣaM̍ dEvabaṛhiḥ̍ śatavaḷśaM̍ ~Mvi rOha̍ sahasravaḷśA̍ - [ ] 2

verses.padam: vIti|vayam|ruhEma|pRuthivyAḥ|saMpRuca̍ iti# saM - pRucaḥ|pAhi|susaMBRutEti̍# su - saMBRutA̱|tvA|samiti|BarAmi|adi̍tyai|rAsnA̱|asi|indrAṇyai|saMnaha̍namiti̍# saM - nahanam|pUṣA|tE|granthim|grathnAtu|saḥ|tE|mA|Eti̍|sthAt|indra̍sya|tvA|bAhuByAmiti̍# bAhu-ByAm|uditi|yacCE|bRuhaspatE̱ḥ|mUrdhnA|harAmi|uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|dEva~ggamamiti̍# dEvam - gamam|asi||3 (38) (sahasravalśA̍ - aṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: vi vayaṃ ruhEma̍ pRuthivyAḥ saMpRucaḥ̍ pAhi susaMBRutA̱ tvA saMBarAmyadi̍tyai̍ rAsnA&sIndrAṇyai̍ sannahanaM̍ pUṣA tE̱ granthiM grathnAtu̍ sa tE mA&& sthAdindrasya̍ tvA bAhuByAmudyacCE̍ bRuhaspatE̱r mUrddhnA harAmyurva̍ntari̍kṣamanvi̍hi̍ dEvaMgamamasi||3̍ (sahasravaḷśA̍ - aṣṭAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: śundhaddhvam|daivyA̍ya|karma̍ṇE|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva -yajyAyai̱|mAtariśvanaḥ|Garmaḥ|asi|dyauḥ|asi|pRuthivI|asi|viśvadhA̍yA̍ iti# viśva -dhAyAḥ|asi|paramEṇa|dhAmnA̱|dRuṃha̍sva|mA|hvAḥ|vasU̍nAm|pavitra̱m|asi|śatadhA̍ramiti̍# śata -dhAram|vasUnAm|pavitra̱m|asi|sahasra̍dhAramiti̍# sahasra# - dhAram|hutaḥ|stOkaḥ|hutaḥ|draPsaḥ|agnayE̱|bRuhatE|nAkAya|svAhA̱|dyAvA̍# pRuthivIByAmiti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|sA|viśvAyuriti# viśva- Ayuḥ|sA|viśvavyacA̍ iti# viśva -vyacAḥ|sA|viśvakarmEti# viśva -karmA|samiti|pRucyaddhvam|RutAvarIrityRu̍ta̍ - varIḥ|UrmiṇI̱ḥ|madhumattamA̍ iti madhumat-tamAḥ|mandrAḥ|dhana̍sya|sAtayE̱|sOmE̍na̍ ( )|tvA|Eti|tanacmi|indrA̍ya|dadhi̍|viṣṇO̍ iti|havyam|rakṣasva||4̍ (58)
verses.samhita: śundhaddhvaM̍ daivyAya̍ karmaṇE̍ dEvayajyAyai# mAtariśvanO̍ GarmO&si̍ dyaurasi̍ pRuthivyasi̍ viśvadhAyA̍ asi paramEṇa dhAmnA dRuṃhasva̍ mA hvAr vasUnAM̍ pavitramasi̍ śatadhAraM̍ ~MvasUnAM̍ pavitramasi̍ sahasradhAraṃ̍ hutaḥ stOkOhutO draPsO̱ &gnayE# bRuhatE nAkAya̍ svAhA dyAvApRuthivIByAṃq̍ sA viśvAyuḥ sA viśvavyacAḥ̍ sA viśvakarmA̍ saM pRucyaddhva-mRutAvarI-rUrmiṇIrmadhu̍mattamA̍ mandrA dhanasya̍ sAtayE sOmEna̍ ( ) tvA&&tanacmIndrA̍ya̍ dadhi viṣṇO# havyaṃ rakṣasva||4̍

verses.padam: karmaṇE|vAm|dEvEBya̍ḥ|śakEyam|vEṣA̍ya|tvA|pratyu̍ṣṭamiti̍ prati# -uṣṭam|rakṣaḥ|pratyu̍ṣṭA̍ iti prati# -uṣṭAḥ|arAtayaḥ|dhUḥ|asi|dhUrva̍|dhUrva̍ntam|dhUrva̍|tam|yaḥ|asmAn|dhUrva̍ti|tam|dhUrva|yam|vayam|dhUrvA̍maḥ|tvam|dEvAnA̱m|asi|sasni̍tamamiti̍ sasni# - tamam|papritamamiti̍ papri# -tamam|juṣṭatamamiti̍ juṣṭa# - tamam|vahnitamamiti̍ vahni# - tamam|dEvahUtamamiti̍# dEva-hUtamam|ahru̍tam|asi|havirdhAnamiti̍# haviḥ - dhAna̱m|dRuṃhasva|mA|hvAḥ|mitrasya̍|tvA|cakṣu̍ṣA|prEti̍|IkṣE|mA|BEḥ|mA|samiti̍|vikthA|mA|tvA|5̍ (50)
verses.samhita: karmaṇE̍ vAM dEvEByaḥ̍ śakEyaM ~MvEṣAya̍ tvA pratyuṣṭaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭA̍ arAtayO̍ dhUrasi̍ dhUrva dhUrvantaM̍ dhUrva taM ~MyO̱&smAn dhUrvati̍ taM dhU̱rvayaM ~MvayaM dhUrvAmastvaM̍ dEvAnAmasi̍ sasnitamaM̍ papritamaM̍ juṣṭatamaM̍ ~MvahnitamaM̍ dEvahUtama-mahru̍tamasi̍ havirdhAnaM dRuṃhasva̍ mA hvA̱r mitrasya# tvA cakṣuṣA̍ prEkṣE mA BErmA saM ~MvikthA̍ mA tvA# - [ ] 5

verses.padam: hiṃqsiṣam|uru|vAtAya|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra -savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu -ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|agnayE̱|juṣṭa̱m|niriti|vapAmi|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|idam|dEvAnA̱m|idam|u|naḥ|saha|sPAtyai|tvA|na|arA̱tyai|suvaḥ|aBi|vIti̍|KyEṣam|vaiśvAnaram|jyOti̍ḥ|dRuṃha̍ntAm|duryA̱ḥ|dyAvA̍pRuthivyOriti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivyOḥ|uru|antarikṣam|anviti̍|ihi|adi̍tyAḥ|tvA|upastha̍ ityupa-sthE|sAdayAmi|agnE̱|havyam|rakṣasva||6 (46) ( mA tvA - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca̍ ) (A4)
verses.samhita: hiṃsiṣamuru vAtAya̍ dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱&śvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByA-magnayE juṣṭaM nirvapAmyagnIṣOmA̱ByA-midaM̍ dEvAnAmidamu̍# naḥ saha sPAtyai tvA nArA̱tyai suvaraBi̍ vi KyEṣaM̍ ~MvaiśvAnaraM jyOtir dRuṃhantAM̍ duryA dyAvApRuthivyO-̍ rurvantari̍kṣa̍ manvi-hyadityA̍ stvOpasthE# sAdayAmyagnE# havyaṃ rakṣasva||6̍

verses.padam: dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|uditi|punAtu|acCi̍drEṇa|pavitrE̍ṇa|vasO̱ḥ|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|Apaḥ|dEvIḥ|agrEpuva̍ ityagrE̍ - puvaḥ|agrEguva ityagrE̍ - guvaḥ|agrE̱|imam|yajñam|nayata|agrE̱|yajñapatimiti̍# yajña - patim|dhatta|yuṣmAn|indraḥ|avRuṇIta|vRutratUrya̍ iti# vRutra -tUryE̱|yUyam|indra̱m|avRuṇIdhvam|vRutratUrya iti# vRutra -tUryE̱|prOkṣitA̍ iti pra -ukṣitAḥ|stha|agnayE̱|vaḥ|juṣṭa̱m|prEti|ukṣAmi|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|śundhadhvam|daivyA̍ya|karma̍ṇE|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva-yajyAyai̱|avadhUtamityava̍# - dhUtam|rakṣaḥ|ava̍dhUtA̍ ityava# - dhUtAḥ|arAtayaḥ|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|asi|pratIti̍|tvA|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvO vaḥ̍ savitOt punAtvacCi̍drEṇa̍ pavitrEṇa̍ vasOḥ sUryasya̍ raśmiBirApO# dEvIragrEpuvO agrEguvO&gra# imaM ~MyajñaM nayatAgrE̍# yajñapatiM̍ dhatta yuṣmAnindrO# &vRuṇIta vRutratUryE# yUyamindra-mavRuṇIddhvaM̍ ~MvRutratUryE prOkṣitAḥ̍ sthAgnayE# vO juṣṭaM prOkṣA̱myagnIṣOmA̱ByAṃq śundhaddhvaM̍ daivyAya̍ karmaṇE̍ dEvayajyAyA avadhUtaṃq̍ rakṣO&vadhUtA̍ arAtayO&di̍tyAstvaga̍si̍ prati# tvA - [ ] 7

verses.padam: pRuthivI|vEttu|adhiṣavaṇamitya̍dhi̍ - savanam|asi|vAnaspatyam|pratIti̍|tvA|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|vEttu|agnEḥ|tanUḥ|asi|vAcaḥ|visarja̍namiti̍# vi-sarjanam|dEvavI̍taya̍ iti# dEva- vItayE|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|adriḥ|asi|vAnaspatyaḥ|saḥ|idam|dEvEBya̍ḥ|havyam|suśamIti̍# su- śami|śamiṣva|iṣa̱m|Eti̍|vada|Urja̱m|Eti̍|vada|dyumaditi̍# dyu-mat|vadata|vayam|sa~gGAtamiti# saM - GAtam|jEṣma|vaṛqṣavRuddhamiti̍# vaṛqṣa -vRuddham|asi|pratIti|tvA|vaṛqṣavRu̍ddhamiti̍# vaṛqṣa -vRuddham|vEttu|parApUtamiti̍ parA̱ - pUtam|rakṣaḥ|parA̍pUtA̍ iti parA̱ - pUtAḥ|arAtayaḥ|rakṣa̍sAm|BAgaḥ̍ ( )|asi|vAyuḥ|vaḥ|vIti|vinaktu|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|hira̍ṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇiḥ|pratIti|gRuhṇAtu||8̍ (61)
verses.samhita: pRuthivI vE̱ttvadhiṣavaṇamasi̍ vAnaspatyaM prati tvA&dityAstvagvE̱ttvagnEstanUra̍si̍ vAcO visarjanaM̍ dEvavItayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAmyadrirasi̍ vAnaspatyaḥ sa idaM dEvEByO# havyaṃ suśami# śamiṣvEṣamA vadOrjamA vada̍ dyumadvadata̍ vayaṃ saMGAtaM̍ jE̱ṣma varq.ṣavRuddhamasi̍ prati# tvA varq.ṣavRuddhaM̍ ~MvEttu parApUtaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ parApUtA̍ arAtayO̍ rakṣasAM̍ BAgO# ( ) &si vAyurvO vi vinaktu̍ dEvO vaḥ̍ savitA hiraṇyapAṇiḥ̍ prati# gRuhṇAtu||8

verses.padam: avadhUtamityava̍# - dhUtam|rakṣaḥ|ava̍dhUtA̍ ityava# - dhUtAḥ|arAtayaḥ|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|asi|pratIti̍|tvA|pRuthivI|vEttu|divaḥ|skamBaniḥ|asi|pratIti̍|tvA|adi̍tyAḥ|tvak|vEttu|dhiṣaṇA̱|asi|parvatyA|pratIti̍|tvA|divaḥ|skamBaniḥ|vEttu|dhiṣaṇA̱|asi|pArvatEyI|pratIti̍|tvA|parvatiḥ|vEttu|dEvasya̍|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra -savE|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|adhIti|vapAmi|dhAnya̱m|asi|dhinuhi|dEvAn|prAṇAyEti̍# pra-anAya|tvA̍ ( )|apAnAtyEpa̍ -anAya|tvA|vyAnAyEti̍# vi- anAya|tvA|dIrGAm|anviti̍|prasi̍timiti̍ pra - sitim|AyuṣE|dhAm|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|hira̍ṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇiḥ|pratIti|gRuhṇAtu||9̍ (65)
verses.samhita: avadhUtaṃq̍ rakṣO&vadhUtA̍ arAtayO&di̍tyAstvaga̍si̍ prati# tvA pRuthivIvE̱ttu divaḥ skaMBanira̍si̍ prati tvA&dityAstvagvE̱ttu̍ dhiṣaṇA&si̍ parvatyA prati# tvA divaḥ skaMBanirvE̱ttu̍ dhiṣaṇA&si̍ pArvatEyI prati# tvA parvatirvE̱ttu dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasavE̱-&śvinO̱r̍ bAhuByA̱M pUṣṇOhastA̱ByAmadhi# vapAmidhAnyamasi̍ dhinuhi dEvAn prAṇAya# tvA ( ) &pAnAya# tvA vyAnAya# tvA dIrGAmanu prasitimAyu̍ṣEdhAM̍ dEvO vaḥ̍ savitA hiraṇyapAṇiḥ̍ prati# gRuhṇAtu||9

verses.padam: dhRuṣṭiḥ|asi|brahma̍|yacCa|apEti̍|agnE|agnim|AmAdamityA̍ma̍ -ada̱m|jahi|niriti|kravyAdamiti̍# kravya- ada̱m|sEdha|Eti|dEvayajamiti̍# dEva-yaja̱m|vaha|nirdagdhamiti̍ niḥ - dagdham|rakṣaḥ|nirda̍gdhA̍ iti niḥ - dagdhAḥ|arAtayaḥ|dhruvam|asi|pRuthivIm|dRuṃqha|Ayu̍ḥ|dRuṃqha|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|dhartram|asi|antari̍kṣam|dRuṃqha|prAṇamiti̍# pra- anam|dRuṃqha|ApAnamityapa̍ - anam|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|dharuṇa̱m|asi|diva̱m|dRuṃqha|cakṣu̍ḥ|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dhRuṣṭirasi̍ brahma# yacCApA̱gnE &gnimAmAdaM̍ jahi niṣkravyAdaṃ# sEdhA&&dEvayaja̍M̍ ~Mvaha nirdagdhaṃq̍ rakṣO nirdagdhA̍ arAtayO̍ dhruvamasi̍ pRuthivIM dRuṃqhA&&*yur̍ dRuṃha prajAM dRuṃha̍ sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dhartramasyantari̍kṣaM̍ dRuṃha prAṇaM dRuṃhApAnaM̍ dRuṃha̍ sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dharuṇamasi̍ divaM̍ dRuṃha cakṣur-̍ [ ] 10

verses.padam: dRuṃqha|śrOtra̱m|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|dharma̍|asi|diśa̍ḥ|dRuṃqha|yOni̱m|dRuṃqha|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|dRuṃqha|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|cita̍ḥ|stha|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|asmai|rayim|asmai|sajAtAniti# sa-jAtAn|asmai|yajamAnAya|parIti̍|Uha|BRugU̍ṇAm|a~ggi̍rasAm|tapa̍sA|tapyadhvam|yAni̍|GarmE|kapAlA̍ni|upacinvantItyu̍pa̍ - cinvanti|vEdhasa̍ḥ||pUṣṇaḥ|tAni̍|apIti̍|vratE|indravAyU̍ itI̱ndra-vAyU|vIti|mu~jcatAm||11̍ (48) (cakṣu# - raṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: dRuṃha śrOtraM̍ dRuṃha sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ dharmAsi̍ diśO# dRuṃha yOniM̍ dRuṃha prajAM dRuṃha̍ sajAtAnasmai yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ citaḥ̍ stha prajAmasmai rayimasmai sajAtAnasmai̍ yajamAnAya̍ paryUha̍ BRugUṇAma~ggi̍rasAM̍ tapasA̍ tapyaddhvaM ~MyAni# GarmE kapAlA̱nyupacinvanti# vEdhasaḥ|pUṣṇastAnyapi̍# vrata indravAyU̍ vi mu~jcatAM||11̍ (cakṣu# - raṣṭAcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: samiti|vapAmi|samiti̍|Apa̍ḥ|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|agmata|samiti|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|rasE̍na|samiti̍|rEvatI̱ḥ|jaga̍tIBiḥ|madhu̍matIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|madhumatIBiriti̍ madhu# - matIBiḥ|sRujyadhvam|adBya ityat̍ - Byaḥ|parIti|prajA̍tA̍ iti pra -jAtAḥ|stha|samiti|adBiritya̍t̍ - Biḥ|pRucyadhvam|janayatyai|tvA|samiti̍|yaumi|agnayE̱|tvA|agnIṣOmA̱ByAmityagnI̍ - sOmA̱ByAm|maKasya|śira̍ḥ|asi|Garmaḥ|asi|viśvAyururiti̍# viśva- Ayuḥ|uru|prathasva|uru|tE|yajñapatiriti̍# yajña -patiḥ|prathatAm|tvaca̱m|gRuhṇIṣva|antaritamityantaḥ̍ - itam|rakṣaḥ|antari̍tA̍ ityantaḥ - itAḥ|arAtayaḥ|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA̍ ( )|śrapayatu|vaṛṣiṣṭhE|adhIti̍|nAkE̱|agniḥ|tE|tanuva̱m|mA|atIti̍|dhAk|agnE̱|havyam|rakṣasva|samiti̍|brahma̍ṇA|pRucyasva|EkatAya̍|svAhA̱|dvitAya̍|svAhA̱|tritAya̍|svAhA̱||12̍ (72) (savitA - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: saM ~MvapAmi̍ samApO# adBiragmata̍ samOṣadhayO̍ rasEna̍ saṃ rEvatIr jagatIBir̍ madhumatIr̍ madhumatIBiḥ̍ sRujyaddhvamadByaḥ pari prajAtAḥ̍ stha samadBiḥ pRucyaddhvaM̍ janayatyai̍ tvA saM ~Myau̱myagnayE̱ tvA&gnIṣOmA̱ByAM maKasya śirO&si̍ GarmO&si̍ viśvAyururu̍ prathasvOru̍ tE# yajñapatiḥ̍ prathatAM tvacaM̍ gRuhṇIṣvAntaritaṃq̍ rakṣO&ntaritA̍ arAtayOdEvastvA̍# savitA ( ) śrapayatu̍ vaṛṣiṣṭhE̍ adhi nAkE&gnistE# tanuvaM mA&ti# dhAgagnE# havyaṃ rakṣasva̍ saM brahmaṇA̍ pRucyasvaikatAya svAhA̱ dvitAya svAhA̱ tritAya svAhA̱||12 (savitA - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: Eti|dadE|indra̍sya|bAhuḥ|asi|dakṣi̍ṇaḥ|sahasra̍BRuṣṭiriti̍# sahasra# -BRuṣṭiḥ|śatatEjA̍ iti# śata -tEjAḥ|vAyuḥ|asi|tigmatEjA̍ iti# tigma - tEjAḥ|pRuthivi|dEvayajanIti̍# dEva -yajani|OṣadhyAḥ|tE|mUla̱m|mA|hiṃqsiṣam|apa̍hata̍ ityapa# -hataḥ|araruḥ|pRuthivyai|vrajam|gacCa|gOsthAnamiti̍# gO-sthAna̱m|vaṛṣatu|tE|dyauḥ|badhAna|dEva|savitaḥ|paramasyA̱m|parAvatIti̍# parA - vati|śatEna̍|pAśai̱ḥ|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|tam|ata̍ḥ|mA|mauk|apa̍hata̍ ityapa# -hataḥ|araruḥ|pRuthivyai|dEvayaja̍nyA̍ iti# dEva -yajanyai|vrajam|13̍ (50)
verses.samhita: A dada̍ indrasya̍ bAhurasi̍ dakṣiṇaḥ̍ sahasraBRuṣṭiḥ̍ śatatEjA̍ vAyurasi̍ tigmatEjAḥ̍ pRuthivi̍ dEvayaja - nyOṣaddhyAstE̍ mUlaM mA hiṃsiṣa-mapa̍hatO&raru̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyai vrajaM gacCa̍ gOsthAnaM ~Mvaṛṣatu̍ tE dyaurbadhAna̍ dEva̍ savitaḥ paramasyA̱M parAvati# śatEna pAśairyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmastamatO mA maugapahatO&raru̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyai dEvayaja̍nyai̍ vrajaM -[ ] 13

verses.padam: gacCa|gOsthAnamiti# gO-sthAna̱m|vaṛṣatu|tE|dyauḥ|badhAna|dEva|savitaḥ|paramasyA̱m|parAvatIti̍# parA - vati|śatEna̍|pAśai̱ḥ|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|tam|ata̍ḥ|mA|mauk|apa̍hata̍ ityapa# -hataḥ|araruḥ|pRuthivyAḥ|adE̍vayajana̍ ityadEva̍ - yajanaḥ|vrajam|gacCa|gOsthAnamiti# gO-sthAna̱m|vaṛṣatu|tE|dyauḥ|badhAna|dEva|savitaḥ|paramasyA̱m|parAvatIti̍# parA - vati|śatEna̍|pAśai̱ḥ|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|tam|ata̍ḥ|mA|14̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gacCa̍ gOsthAnaM ~Mvaṛṣatu̍ tE dyaurbadhAna̍ dEva̍ savitaḥ paramasyA̱M parAvati# śatEna pAśairyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmastamatO mA maugapahatO&raru̍ḥ̍ pRuthivyA adEvayajanO̍ vrajaM gacCa̍ gOsthAnaM ~Mvaṛṣatu̍ tE dyaurbadhAna̍ dEva̍ savitaḥ paramasyA̱M parAvati# śatEna pAśairyO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣmastamatO mA -[ ] 14

verses.padam: mauk|araruḥ|tE|diva̱m|mA|skAn|vasa̍vaḥ|tvA|parIti̍|gRuhṇantu|gAyatrEṇa̍|Canda̍sA|rudrAḥ|tvA|parIti̍|gRuhṇantu|traiṣṭu̍BEna|Canda̍sA|AdityAḥ|tvA|parIti̍|gRuhṇantu|jAga̍tEna|Canda̍sA|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|savE|karma̍|kRuṇvanti|vEdhasa̍ḥ|Rutam|asi|Rutasada̍namityRu̍ta̍ -sadanam|asi|RutaśrIrityRu̍ta̍ - śrIḥ|asi|dhAḥ|asi|svadhEti# sva- dhA|asi|urvI|ca|asi|vasvI̱|ca|asi|purA|krUrasya̍|visRupa̍ iti# vi- sRupaḥ|viraphśinniti̍# vi- raphśinn ( )|udAdAyEtyut̍ - AdAya|pRuthivIm|jIradA̍nuriti̍# jIra - dAnuḥ|yAm|airayann|candrama̍si|svadhABiriti̍# sva-dhABiḥ|tAm|dhIrA̍saḥ|anudRuśyEtya̍nu̍ anu - dRuśya|yajantE||15̍ (61)
verses.samhita: maugararu̍stE̍ divaM mA skAnq. vasavastvA̍ pari# gRuhṇantu gAyatrEṇa CandasArudrAstvA̍ pari# gRuhṇantu traiṣṭuBEna̍ CandasA&&dityAstvA̍ pari# gRuhṇantu jAgatEna̍ CandasA̍ dEvasya# savituḥ savE karma# kRuṇvanti vEdhasa# RutamasyRutasada̍na-masyRutaśrIra̍si̍ dhA asi̍ svadhA asyurvI̍ cAsi vasvI# cAsi purA krUrasya# visRupO# viraPśin ( ) nudAdAya# pRuthivIM jIradAnuryAmaira̍yan̍ candramasi̍ svadhABistAM dhIrAsO̍ anudRuśya# yajantE||15

verses.padam: pratyuṣṭamiti̍ prati# - uṣṭam|rakṣaḥ|pratyu̍ṣṭA̍ iti prati# -uṣṭAḥ|arAtayaḥ|agnEḥ|vaḥ|tEji̍ṣṭhEna|tEja̍sA|niriti̍|tapAmi|gOṣṭhamiti̍# gO -stham|mA|niriti|mRukṣam|vAjina̱m|tvA|sapatnasAhamiti̍# sapatna - sAham|samiti|mArjmi|vAca̱m|prAṇamiti̍# prA- anam|cakṣuḥ|śrOtra̱m|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|yOni̱m|mA|niriti|mRukṣam|vAjinI̱m|tvA|sapatnasAhImiti̍# sapatna - sAhIm|samiti|mArjmi|AśAsAnEtyA̱̍ -śAsAnA|saumanasam|prajAmiti̍# pra -jAm|sauBA̱gyam|tanUm||agnEḥ|anuvratEtyanu̍# -vratA|BUtvA|samiti|nahyE|sukRutAyEti̍# su -kRutAya|kam||suprajasa̍ iti# su-prajasaḥ|tvA|vayam|supatnIriti̍# su-patnI̱ḥ|upEti|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pratyuṣṭaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pratyuṣṭA̍ arAtayO̍ &gnErvastEjiṣṭhEna̍ tEjasA̍ niṣṭapAmi̍ gOṣṭhaM mA nirmRukṣaM̍ ~MvAjinaM̍ tvA sapatnasAhaṃ saM mA̱rjmi vAcaM̍ prAṇaM cakṣuḥ śrOtraM̍ prajAM ~MyOniM mA nirmRukṣaM̍ ~MvAjinI̱M tvA sapatnasAhIṃ saM mA̱rjmyAśAsAnA̍ saumanasaM prajAṃ sauBA̱gyaM tanUM|agnEranuvratA̍ BUtvA saM nahyE̍ sukRutAya kaM||suprajasastvA̍ vayaṃ supatnIrupa-̍ [ ] 16

verses.padam: sEdima||agnE̱|sapatnadamBanamiti̍# sapatna-damBanam|ada̍bdhAsaḥ|adA̱Byam||imam|vIti̍|syAmi|varu̍ṇasya|pAśa̱m|yam|aba̍dhnIta|savitA|sukEta̍ iti# su-kEtaḥ||dhAtuḥ|ca|yOnau̱|sukRutasyEti̍# su -kRutasya|lOkE|syOnam|mE|saha|patyA̱|karOmi||samiti̍|Ayu̍ṣA|samiti̍|prajayEti̍# pra-jayA̱|samiti|agnE|varca̍sA|puna̍ḥ||samiti̍|patnI̱|patyA̱|aham|gacCE|samiti̍|AtmA|tanuvA̱|mama̍||mahInAm|paya̍ḥ|asi|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasa̍ḥ|tasya̍|tE|akṣI̍yamAṇasya|niriti̍|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sEdima|agnE# sapatnadaMBanamada̍bdhAsO̍ adA̱ByaM||imaM ~MviṣyAmi̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaMq ~MyamabaddhnIta̍ savitA sukEtaḥ|dhAtuśca̍ yOnau# sukRutasya# lOkE syOnaM mE# saha patyA# karOmi||samAyuṣA̍ saMprajayA samagnE̍ varcasA̍ punaḥ|saM̍ patnI patyA&haM gacCE̍ samAtmA tanuvA mama||mahInAM̍ payO&syOṣadhInAṃq̍ rasastasya tE&kṣIyamAṇasya̍ nir-[ ] 17

verses.padam: vapAmi|mahInAm|payaḥ|asi|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasa̍ḥ|ada̍bdhEna|tvA|cakṣu̍ṣA|avEti̍|IkṣE|suprajAstvAyEti̍# suprajAḥ - tvAya|tEja̍ḥ|asi|tEja̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|ihi|agniḥ|tE|tEja̍ḥ|mA|vIti̍|nait|agnEḥ|jihvA|asi|suBUriti̍# su - BUḥ|dEvAnA̱m|dhAmnE# dhAmna iti dhAmnE̱ - dhAmnE|dEvEByaḥ|yaju̍ṣEyajuṣa̍ iti yajuṣE̍ -yajuṣE|Bava|śukram|asi|jyOtiḥ|asi|tEja̍ḥ|asi|dEvaḥ|vaḥ|savitA|uditi̍|punAtu|acCi̍drEṇa|pavitrE̍ṇa|vasO̱ḥ|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi-Biḥ|śukram ( )|tvA|śukrAyA̱m|dhAmnE# dhAmna iti dhAmnE̱ - dhAmnE|dEvEByaḥ|yaju̍ṣEyajuṣa̍ iti yajuṣE̍ - yajuṣE|gRuhṇAmi|jyOtiḥ|tvA|jyOti̍ṣi|arciḥ|tvA|arciṣi̍|dhAmnE̍# dhAmna iti dhAmnE̱ - dhAmnE|dEvEByaḥ|yaju̍ṣEyajuṣa̍ iti yajuṣE̍ -yajuṣE|gRuhṇAmi||18 (66) (upa - ni - raśmibhiḥ̍ śukraṃ - ṣOḍaśa̍ ca) (A10)
verses.samhita: vapAmi̍ mahInAM payO&syOṣadhInAṃq̍ rasO&dabdhEna̍ tvA cakṣuṣA&vE̱kṣE suprajAstvAya tEjO&si̍ tEjO&nu prEhyagnistE tEjO mA vi naidagnEr̍ jihvA&si# suBUrdEvAnAM dhAmnEdhAmnE̍ dEvEByO yajuṣEyajuṣE̍ Bava śukramasi̍ jyOtirasi̍ tEjO&si̍ dEvO vaḥ̍ savitOt punAtvacCi̍drEṇa̍ pavitrEṇa̍ vasOḥ sUryasya̍ raśmiBiḥ̍ śukraM ( ) tvA# śukrAyAM dhAmnEdhAmnE̍ dEvEByO yajuṣEyajuṣE̍ gRuhṇAmi jyOtistvA̍ jyOtiṣyarcistvA&rciṣi̍ dhAmnEdhAmnE̍ dEvEByO yajuṣEyajuṣE̍ gRuhṇAmi||18

verses.padam: kRuṣṇaḥ|asi|AKarEṣṭha̍ ityAKarE̍ - sthaḥ|agnayE̱|tvA|svAhA̱|vEdiḥ|asi|baṛqhiṣE̱|tvA|svAhA̱|baṛqhiḥ|asi|srugBya̍ iti# sruk -Byaḥ|tvA|svAhA̱|divE|tvA|antarikṣAya|tvA|pRuthivyai|tvA|svadhEti̍# sva-dhA|pitRuBya iti# pitRu -Byaḥ|Urk|Bava|baṛqhiṣadBya iti# baṛhiṣat - Byaḥ|UrjA|pRuthivIm|gacCata|viṣṇO̱ḥ|stUpaḥ|asi|UrṇA̱mradasamityUrṇA̱̍ - mradasam|tvA|stRuṇAmi|svAsasthamiti# su -Asastham|dEvEByaḥ|gandharva̍ḥ|asi|viśvAva̍suriti̍# viśva - vasuḥ|viśvasmAt|Iṣa̍taḥ|yaja̍mAnasya|paridhiriti̍# pari - dhiḥ|iḍaḥ|Iḍitaḥ|indrasya|bAhuḥ|asi|19̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kRuṣṇO̱&syAKarEṣṭhO̱&gnayE̱ tvA svAhA vEdirasi̍ barqḥiṣE̱ tvA svAhA barqḥira̍si̍ srugByastvA svAhA# divE tvA&ntarikṣAya̍ tvA pRuthivyai tvA̱ svadhA pitRuBya UrgBava̍ baṛhiṣadBya# UrjA pRuthivIM̍ gacCata̍ viṣṇOḥ stUpO&syUrṇA̱mradasaM tvA stRuṇAmi svAsasthaM dEvEByO# gandharvO&si̍ viśvAvasur̍ viśvasmAdIṣa̍tO̍ yajamAnasya̍ paridhiriḍa Iḍita̍ indrasya̍ bAhurasi̍ -[ ] 19

verses.padam: dakṣiṇaḥ|yaja̍mAnasya|paridhiriti̍# pari - dhiḥ|iḍaḥ|Iḍitaḥ|mitrAvaruṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|tvA|uttarata̍ ityut̍ - tarataḥ|parIti|dhattAm|dhruvEṇa̍|dharma̍ṇA|yaja̍mAnasya|paridhiriti̍# pari - dhiḥ|iḍaḥ|Iḍitaḥ|sUryaḥ|tvA|purastA̱t|pAtu|kasyA̱ḥ|cit|aBiśa̍styA̍ ityaBi -śastyAḥ|vItihO̱tramiti# -vIti - hOtram|tvA|kavE|dyumantamiti# dyu - manta̱m|samiti|idhImahi|agnE̱|bRuhanta̱m|adhvarE|viśaḥ|yantrE̍ iti|sthaḥ|vasU̍nAm|rudrAṇA̱m|AdityAnA̱m|sada̍si|sIda|juhUḥ|upaBRudityu̍pa̍ - BRut|dhruvA|asi|GRutAcI̱|nAmnA̱|priyEṇa|nAmnA̱|priyE|sada̍si̍ ( )|sIda|EtAḥ|asadann|sukRutasyEti# su-kRutasya|lOkE|tAḥ|viṣṇO̍ iti|pAhi|pAhi|yajñam|pAhi|yajñapa̍timiti̍# yajña-patim|pAhi|mAm|yajñaniyamiti# yajña - niya̱m||20 (65)
verses.samhita: dakṣiṇO̍ yajamAnasya̍ paridhiriḍa IḍitO̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ tvOttarataḥ pari# dhattAM dhruvEṇa dharmaṇA̍ yajamAnasya̍ paridhiriḍa Iḍitaḥ̍ sUryastvA̍ purastA̱t pAtu kasyA̱ścidaBiśastyA̍ vItihO̱traM tvA kavE dyumantaṃq samidhImahyagnE̍# bRuhantamaddhvarE̍ viśO yantrE sthO vasUnAṃ̍ rudrAṇA-mAdityAnAṃq̍ sadasi̍ sIda juhUrupaBRud̍ dhruvA&si# GRutAcI nAmnA̱ priyEṇa nAmnA̱ priyE sadasi̍ ( ) sIdaitA asadanth̍ sukRutasya# lOkE tA viṣṇO̍ pAhi pAhi yajñaM pAhi yajñapatiM̍ pAhi mAM ~Myajñaniya̱M||20̍

verses.padam: Buvanam|asi̍|vIti̍|prathasva|agnE̱|yaṣṭa̍ḥ|idam|nama̍ḥ||juhu̍|Eti̍|ihi|agniḥ|tvA|hvayati|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva -yajyAyai̱|upaBRudityupa̍# -BRut|Eti|ihi|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|hvayati|dEvayajyAyA̍ iti# dEva -yajyAyai̱|agnAviṣṇU̍ ityagnA̱ -viṣṇU|mA|vAm|avEti|kramiṣam|vIti̍|jihAthAm|mA|mA|samiti̍|tAptam|lOkam|mE|lOkakRutAviti̍# lOka-kRutau|kRuṇutam|viṣṇO̱ḥ|sthAna̱m|asi|itaḥ|indraḥ|akRuṇOt|vIryA̍ṇi|samAraByEti̍# saM-AraBya|Urddhvaḥ|addhvaraḥ|divispRuśamiti̍# divi -spRuśa̱m|ahrutaḥ̍ ( )|yajñaḥ|yajñapatEriti̍# yajña - patEḥ|indrAvAnitIndra̍# - vAn|svAhA̱|bRuhat|BAḥ|pAhi|mA|agnE|duścaritAditi̍ duḥ - caritAt|Eti|mA|suca̍rita̍ iti su - caritE|Baja|maKasya|śira̍ḥ|asi|samiti̍|jyOti̍ṣA|jyOti̍ḥ|a~gktAm||21̍ (71) (ahruta̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A12)
verses.samhita: Buvanamasi̍ vi prathasvAgnE̍ yaṣṭaridaM̍ namaḥ|juhvEhyagnistvA̱̍ hvayati dEvayajyAyA upaBRudEhi̍# dEvastvA# savitA hvayati̍ dEvayajyAyA agnAviṣṇU̍ mA vAmava# kramiṣaM ~Mvi jihAthAM̍ mA mA saM tA̱ptaM ~MlOkaM mE# lOkakRutau kRuṇutaM ~MviṣṇOḥ sthAnamasIta̍ indrO# akRuṇOd vIryAṇi̍ samAraByOrddhvO addhvarO̍ divispRuśamahru̍tO̍ ( ) yajñO yajñapatE-rindrA̍vAnth̍ svAhA# bRuhadBAḥ pAhi mA̱&gnE duścaritAdA̍ mA sucaritE̍ Baja maKasya śirO&si̍ saMjyOtiṣA̍ jyOtira~gktAM||21̍ (ahruta̍ - Ekaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: vAjasya|mA|prasavEnEti̍# pra-savEna|udgrABEṇEtyu̍t̍ -grABEṇa|uditi̍|agraBIt||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indra̍ḥ|mE|nigrABEṇEti̍# ni-grABEṇa|adha̍rAn|akaḥ||udgrABamityu̍t̍ -grABam|ca|nigrABamiti# ni -grABam|ca|brahma|dEvAḥ|avIvRudhann||atha̍|sapatnAn̍|indrAgnI̍ itI̱ndra-agnI|mE|viṣUcInAn|vIti̍|asyatAm||vasu̍Bya̍ iti vasu-Byaḥ|tvA|rudrEBya̍ḥ|tvA|AdityEBya̍ḥ|tvA|aktam|rihA̍ṇAḥ|viyantu̍|vaya̍ḥ||prajAmiti̍# pra-jAm|yOni̱m|mA|niriti|mRukṣam|Eti̍|pyAyantAm|Apa̍ḥ|Oṣa̍dhayaḥ|marutA̱m|pRuṣa̍tayaḥ|stha|diva̱M|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAjasya̍ mA prasavEnO̱dgrABEṇOdagraBIt|athA̍# sapatnAṃq indrO# mE nigrABEṇAdharAṃ̍ akaḥ||udgrABaM ca# nigrABaM ca brahma# dEvA avIvRudhann|athA̍# sapatnAnindrAgnI̍ mE# viṣUcInAn vyasyatAM||vasu̍ByastvA̍ rudrEByastvA&&dityEBya̍stvA&ktaṃ̍ rihAṇA̍ viyantu vayaḥ||prajAM̍ ~MyOniM mA nirmRukṣamA̍ pyAyantAmApa̍ OṣadhayO̍ marutAM pRuṣatayaḥ̍ stha divaM-̍ [ ] 22

verses.padam: gacCa|tataḥ|naḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eti̍|Iraya||AyuṣpA̍ ityAyuḥ-̍ pAḥ|agnE|asi|Ayuḥ|mE|pAhi|cakṣuṣpA̍ iti# - cakṣuḥ - pAḥ|agnE|asi|cakṣuḥ|mE|pAhi|dhruvA|asi|yam|paridhimiti̍# pari -dhim|paryadhatthA̍ iti# pari -adhatthAḥ|agnE̱|dEva|paṇiBiriti̍# paṇi -Biḥ|vIyamAṇaḥ||tam|tE|Etam|anviti̍|jOṣa̱m|BarAmi|na|it|Eṣaḥ|tvat|apacEtayA̍tA̍ ityapa̍ - cEtayAtai|yajñasya̍|pAtha̍ḥ|upa̍|samiti̍|itam|saṅqsrAvaBA̍gA̍ iti# saṅsrAva -BAgAḥ|stha|iṣAḥ|bRuhantaḥ|prastarEṣṭhA̍ iti# prastarE- sthAḥ|baṛqhiṣada iti baṛhi-sadaḥ|ca|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: gacCa tatO# nO vRuṣṭimEraya|AyuṣpA̍ agnE&syAyu̍rmE̍ pAhi cakṣuṣpA agnE&si̍ cakṣurmE̍ pAhi dhruvA&si yaM paridhiM̍ paryadhatthA̍ agnE# dEva paṇiBir̍ vIyamAṇaḥ|taM̍ ta# Etamanu jOṣaM̍ BarAmi nEdEṣa tvadapacEtayA̍tai̍ yajñasya pAtha upa samitaṃ̍ saṅsrAvaBAgAḥ̍ sthEṣA bRuhantaḥ̍ prastarEṣṭhA baṛhiṣada̍śca-̍ [ ] 23

verses.padam: dEvAḥ|imAm|vAca̱m|aBIti|viśvE̱|gRuṇanta̍ḥ|AsadyEtyA̱̍ - sadya|asminn|baṛqhiṣi̍|mAdayadhvam|agnEḥ|vAm|apa̍nnagRuhasyEtyapa̍nna̍ - gRuhasya|sadasi|sAdayAmi|sumnAya̍|sumninI̍ iti|sumnE|mA|dhattam|dhuri|dhuryau̱|pAtam|agnE̱|adabdhAyO̍ ityadabdha-AyO|aśItatanO̍ ityaśita̍ -tanO|pAhi|mA|adya|divaḥ|pAhi|prasityA̍ iti pra-sityai|pAhi|duriṣṭyA̍ iti duḥ -iṣṭyai|pAhi|duradmanyA iti# duḥ -admanyai|pAhi|duścaritAditi̍ duḥ - caritAt|aviṣam|naḥ|pitum|kRuṇu|suṣadEti̍# su -sadA̱|yOni̱m|svAhA̱|dEvA̱ḥ|gAtuvida iti# gAtu-vidaḥ|gAtum|vittvA|gAtum ( )|ita|manasaḥ|patE|imam|naḥ|dEva|dEvEṣu̍|yajñam|svAhA̱|vAci|svAhA̱|vAtE̱|dhAḥ||24̍ (63)
verses.samhita: dEvA imAM ~MvAcamaBi̍ viśvE# gRuṇanta# AsadyAsmin barqḥiṣi# mAdayaddhvamagnEr vAmapannagRuhasya̍ sadasi̍ sAdayAmi suMnAya# suMninI suMnE mA# dhattaM dhuri dharyau# pAtamagnE# &dabdhAyO &śItatanO pAhi mA&dya divaḥ pAhi prasityai̍ pAhi duriṣṭyai̍ pAhi duradmanyai̍ pAhi duścaritAdavi̍ṣaM̍ naḥ pituM kRuṇu̍ suṣadA yOniṅq svAhA dEvA# gAtuvidO gAtuM ~MvittvA gAtu ( ) mita̍ manasaspata̍ imaM nO# dEva dEvEṣu# yajñaṅ svAhA# vAci svAhA vAtE# dhAḥ||24

verses.padam: uBA|vAm|indrAgnI itI̱ndra - agnI|Ahuvadhyai̱|uBA|rAdhasaḥ|saha|mAdayadhyai̱||uBA|dAtArau̱|iṣAm|rayIṇAm|uBA|vAja̍sya|sAtayE̱|huvE|vAm|aśra̍vam|hi|BUridAva̍ttarEti̍# BUridAvat̍ -tarA|vAm||vijAmAturiti̍ vi - jAmAtuḥ|uta|vA|Ga|syAlAt||atha|sOma̍sya|prayatIti̍ pra-yatI|yuvaByAmiti# yuva - ByAm|indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|stOma̱m|janayAmi|navya̱m||indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|navatim|puraḥ|dAsapa̍tnIriti̍# dAsa - patnIḥ|adhUnutam||sAkam|EkEna|karma̍ṇA||śuci̱m|nu|stOma̱m|nava̍jAtamiti̍ nava-̍ jAtam|adya|indrA̱gnI itIndra# - agnI|vRutrahaṇEti# vRutra -hanA|juṣEthA̱m||25 (50)
verses.samhita: uBA vAmindrAgnI̍ AhuvaddhyA# uBA rAdhasaḥ̍ saha mAdayaddhyai̱|uBA̍ dAtArAviṣAṃ̍ rayIṇAmuBA̍ vAjasya̍ sAtayE# huvE vAM||aśravaṃq̍ hi BUridAva̍ttarA̍ vAM ~MvijAmAturuta̍ vA# GA syAlAt|athA sOmasya̍ prayatI̍ yuvaByAmindrA̱gnI stOmaM̍ janayAmi navya̱M||indrA̱gnI navatiM purO# dAsapatnIradhUnutaM|sAkamEkE̍na̍ karmaṇA||śuciM̍ nu stOmaM navajAta-madyEndrA̱gnI̍ vRutrahaṇA juṣEthA̱M|25

verses.padam: uBA|hi|vAm|suhavEti# su-havA̱|jOhavImi|tA|vAja̱m|sadyaḥ|uśatE|dhEṣṭhA̱||vayam|u|tvA|pathaḥ|patE|ratha̱m|na|vAja̍sAtaya̍ iti vAja-sAtayE||dhiyE|pUṣann|ayujmahi||pathaspa̍tha̍ iti# pathaḥ - pathaḥ|paripatimiti̍ pari-patim|vacasyA|kAmE̍na|kRutaḥ|aBIti̍|Anaṭ|arkam||saḥ|naḥ|rAsat|śurudha̍ḥ|candrAgrA̍ iti# candra - agrAḥ|dhiyandhiyamiti̍ dhiya̱M - dhiyam|sIṣadhAti|prEti|pUṣA||kṣEtra̍sya|pati̍nA|vayam|hitEna̍|iva|jayAmasi||gAm|aśva̱m|pOṣayitnu|Eti̍|saḥ|naḥ|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: uBA hi vAṃ# suhavA jOhavImi̍ tA vAjaṃ# sadya uśatE̍ dhEṣṭhA̱||vayamu# tvA pathaspatE rathaM na vAjasAtayE|dhiyE̍ pUṣannayujmahi||pathaspa̍thaḥ̍ paripatiM̍ ~MvacasyA kAmEna̍ kRutO aByAnaḍarkaM|sanO̍# rAsacCurudhaścandrAgrA̍ dhiyaMdhiyaṃ̍ sIṣadhAti pra pUṣA||kṣEtrasya̍ patinA̍ vayaṃ hitEnEva̍ jayAmasi|gAmaśvaM̍ pOṣayitnvA sa nO# - [ ] 26

verses.padam: mRuḍAti|IdRuśE̱||kṣEtrasya|patE|madhu̍mantamiti̍ madhu-mantam|Urmim|dhEnuḥ|iva|paya̍ḥ|asmAsu̍|dhukṣva||madhuścutamiti̍# madhu-ścuta̱m|GRutam|iva|supUtamiti̍ su-pUtam|Rutasya|naḥ|pata̍yaḥ|mRuḍayantu||agnE̱|naya̍|supathEti̍# su-pathA̱|rAyE|asmAn|viśvAni|dEva|vayunA̍ni|vidvAn||yuyOdhi|asmat|juhurAṇam|Ena̍ḥ|BUyi̍ṣṭhAm|tE|nama̍uktimiti̍ namaḥ-uktim|vidhEma||Eti̍|dEvAnA̱m|apIti̍|panthA̱m|aganma|yat|śaknavA̍ma|tat|anviti̍|pravO̍ḍhumiti̍ pra- vOḍhum||agniḥ|vidvAn|saḥ|yajAt|27 (50)
verses.samhita: mRuḍAtIdRuśE̱||kṣEtrasya̍ patE madhumantamUrmiM̍ dhEnuriva̍ payO# asmAsu# dhukṣva|madhuścutaM̍ GRutamiva̍ supUtamRutasya̍# naḥ patayO̍ mRuḍayantu||agnE naya# supathA# rAyE asmAn. viśvAni̍ dEva vayunAni̍ vidvAn|yuyOddhyasmajju̍hurAṇamEnO̍ BUyiṣṭhAM̍ tE namauktiM̍ ~MvidhEma||A dEvAnAmapi panthAmaganma̍ yacCaknavAma̍ tadanu pravOḍhuM|agnir̍ vidvAnth sa yajAth̍ - [ ] 27

verses.padam: saḥ|it|u|hOtA̱|saḥ|adhvarAn|saḥ|RutUn|kalpayAti||yat|vAhiṣṭham|tat|agnayE̱|bRuhat|arca|viBAvasO̍ iti# viBA-vasO||mahiṣI|iva|tvat|rayiḥ|tvat|vAjA̱ḥ|uditi̍|IratE||agnE̱|tvam|pAraya|navya̍ḥ|asmAn|svastiBiriti̍# svasti -Biḥ|atIti|durgAṇIti̍# duḥ -gAni|viśvA̱||pUḥ|ca|pRuthvI|bahulA|naḥ|urvI|Bava̍|tOkAya̍|tana̍yAya|śam|yOḥ||tvam|agnE|vratapA̍ iti# vrata- pAḥ|asi|dEvaḥ|Eti# ( )|martyEṣu|A||tvam|yajñEṣu̍|Iḍya̍ḥ||yat|vaḥ|vayam|praminAmEti̍# pra-minAma|vratAni̍|viduṣA̱m|dEvAḥ|avi̍duṣṭarAsa̍ ityaviduḥ̍ - tarAsaḥ||agniḥ|tat|viśva̱m|Eti|pRuṇAti|vidvAn|yEBi̍ḥ|dEvAn|RutuBirityRutu̍ -Biḥ|kalpayAti||28̍ (73) (juṣEthAmA - sA nO# - yajA - dA - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍ (A14) Beginning padas of all 1 to 14 AnuvAkams :- (iṣE tvA# - yajñasya - śunddhadhvam̍ - karmaṇE̍ vAm - dEvO - &vadhUtam̍ - dhuṣṭiḥ - saM vapA-̍ myA dadE̍ - pratyuṣṭam̍ - kRuṣṇO&si̍ - Buvanamasi̍ - vAjasyO̍ - bhA vAM - caturdaśa̍ ) Begninning padas of every 1st, 11th and 21st pancAti's :- (iṣE - druṃha̍ - Buvana̍ - maṣṭAviṃśatiḥ̍ ) First and Last padam of prathama prasanam :- (iṣE tvA# - kalpayAti)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||----------------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: sEdu hOtA sO addhvarAnth̍ sa RutUn kalpayAti||yadvAhi̍ṣṭhaM̍ tadagnayE# bRuhadarca̍ viBAvasO|mahiṣIva̍ tvadrayistvadvAjA udIratE||agnE̍ tvaM pArayA̍ navyO# asmAnth svastiBirati# durgAṇi viśvA̱|pUśca# pRuthvI bahulA̍ na# urvI BavA# tOkAya tanayAya̍ śaM ~MyOḥ||tvamagnE̍ vratapA asi̍ dEva A ( ) martyEṣvA|tvaM ~MyajñEṣvIḍyaḥ||yadvO̍# vayaM praminAma̍# vratAni# viduṣA̱M dEvA aviduṣṭarAsaḥ|agniṣṭad̍ viśvamA pRuṇAti̍ vidvAn. yEBir̍ dEvAṃ RutuBiḥ̍ kalpayAti||28̍ (juṣEthAmA - sa nO# - yajA - dA - trayOviṃśatiśca)̍ (A14) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 anuvAkams :- (iṣE tvA# - yajñasya - śundhadhvaM̍ - karmaṇE̍ vAM - dEvO-&vadhUtaM̍ - dhuṣṭiḥ - saM ~MvapA-̍ myA dadE̍ - pratyuṣṭaM̍ - kRuṣṇO&si̍ - Buvanamasi̍ - vAjasyOBA̍ vAM - caturdaśa̍ ) korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (iṣE - dRuṃha̍ - Buvana̍ - maṣṭAviṃśatiḥ̍ ) first and last padam of First praśnam :- (iṣE tvA# - kalpayAti)||hariḥ̍# OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE prathamaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||========================================== OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.2 prathamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ -
